name: Viper Strike
desc: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Thirst
desc: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed and attack damage whenever an enemy hero's health falls below 75%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero.

name: Heartstopper Aura
desc: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.

name: Bristleback
desc: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes 210 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.

name: Purification
desc: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.

name: Ice Armor
desc: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit or building, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Lasts 40 seconds.

name: Windrun
desc: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.

name: Light Strike Array
desc: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.

name: Fury Swipes
desc: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 20 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

name: Reverse Polarity
desc: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.
